page.content: {SQUARES 3812 & 3912 The area lies within the Metropolitan Green Belt. This inhibits the farmer's progress in modern{FARMING}techniques, as he is obliged to maintain the natural features of the{LANDSCAPE}such as hedgerows which he might otherwise take out to enlarge fields, making farming more efficient and the use of large machinery easier. {EMPLOYMENT}in the Stanstead Abbotts area at the moment (1985) stems mainly from the construction of the Stanstead Abbotts' by-pass which runs to the south and east of the village. It bisects many farms, making fields much smaller and less economical.
